scripts.test: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml exec alfa.test php artisan test
scripts.test:unit: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml exec alfa.test php artisan test --testsuite=Unit
scripts.test:feature: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml exec alfa.test php artisan test --testsuite=Feature
scripts.test:coverage: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml exec alfa.test php artisan test --coverage
scripts.test:parallel: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml exec alfa.test php artisan test --parallel
scripts.test:filter: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml exec alfa.test php artisan test --filter
scripts.test:setup: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d && docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml exec alfa.test php artisan migrate:fresh --seed
